summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Karion Trading Dashboard with new multi-source analysis engine and COT page. All backend APIs (15/15) passed. Frontend loads correctly with KARION branding, 4 market analysis cards, VIX/Regime bar, COT page with expandable categories, and Risk page with real VIX data.

issues: Login page shows 'Trading Hub' instead of 'KARION' branding - minor inconsistency with main app branding

passed_tests: API Root Endpoint - 100% success
User Login with test@test.com / password123 - Working
Multi-Source Analysis API - All 4 assets (XAUUSD, NAS100, SP500, EURUSD) with direction, p_up, confidence, impulse, drivers
COT Data API - All 4 assets with bias, confidence, squeeze_risk, categories
COT Single Symbol API - Working
VIX API - Real data from Yahoo Finance (source: yahoo_finance)
Market Prices API - All assets with real prices
Risk Analysis API - Complete risk score with components
Philosophy Quote API - Italian quotes
Psychology Stats API - Working with auth
Ascension Status API - Working with auth
Home Page - KARION title visible in header
Home Page - 4 market analysis cards displayed with fixed height (non-expandable tabs)
Home Page - VIX/Regime summary bar showing real VIX data
Home Page - Click on card opens modal with details (direction, p_up, confidence, impulse, drivers, invalidation)
COT Page - All 4 assets displayed with bias badges (Bull/Bear/Neutral)
COT Page - Confidence, Crowding, Squeeze Risk metrics visible
COT Page - Expandable category details (Asset Manager, Leveraged, Dealer, etc.)
COT Page - Tabs (Overview, Indici, Gold, Forex) working
COT Page - Next release countdown displayed
Risk Page - Real VIX data loaded (VIX: 16.05)
Risk Page - Risk score gauge with category (MEDIUM)
Risk Page - Component breakdown (VIX Level, VIX Momentum, Event Risk, Market Stretch)
Sidebar Navigation - COT link present and working
critical_code_review_comments: Login page branding shows 'Trading Hub' instead of 'KARION' - consider updating for consistency
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features working correctly. Backend uses yfinance for real VIX data. COT data is SIMULATED (not real CFTC data) but has realistic structure. Multi-source analysis engine combines VIX/Regime, Macro, News Flow, and COT positioning with asset-specific weights.

mocked_apis.COT Data: SIMULATED - Categories data is generated with realistic structure but not from real CFTC reports

features_verified.home_page_4_cards: XAUUSD, NAS100, SP500, EURUSD - all displaying with fixed height
features_verified.card_modal: Opens with direction, p_up, confidence, impulse, drivers, invalidation
features_verified.cot_4_assets: NAS100, SP500, XAUUSD, EURUSD with bias, confidence, squeeze_risk
features_verified.cot_expandable_categories: Asset Manager, Leveraged, Dealer categories expandable
